full_summary:
### External Practice Inspection of the Internal Audit Function at Public Safety Canada

#### Solicitation Number
202305865A

#### Tender Closing Date
August 22, 2023, at 14:00

#### Contract Description
Public Safety Canada (PSC) invites interested Supply Arrangement Holders who have quality under Stream 2: Internal Audit Quality Assessments to submit a proposal for the provision of professional audit support services. The successful contractor will be expected to conduct an external practice inspection of PSC's Internal Audit Function to ensure its conformity with the Treasury Board's Internal Audit Policy Suite.

#### Period of Work
The contract is expected to commence on October 1, 2023 and end on March 31, 2024.

#### Evaluation Process and Selection Methodology
The evaluation process will be based on the combined rating of technical merit (60%) and price (40%). 

#### Security Requirements
A secret security clearance is required for the successful contractor.

#### Tender Description
The successful contractor must have expertise in conducting internal audit assessments and must be familiar with the International Professional Practices Framework (IPPF) of the Institute of Internal Auditors (IIA). The contractor will be expected to evaluate the Internal Audit Function's compliance with the Policy on Internal Audit and the Directive on Internal Audit.

#### Key Requirements
1.  The contractor must possess a secret security clearance.
2.  The contractor must have performed similar audit assessments under Stream 2: Internal Audit Quality Assessments.
3.  The contractor must be familiar with the International Professional Practices Framework (IPPF) of the Institute of Internal Auditors (IIA).
4.  The contractor must evaluate the Internal Audit Function's compliance with the Policy on Internal Audit and the Directive on Internal Audit.

#### Contact Information
Chantale Grgoire, Chief Audit Executive, Public Safety Canada
Email: chantale.gregoire@ps-sp.gc.ca
Phone: (613) 549-5220

#### Procurement Document
The procurement document is available for download on the PS-NCAR (PS-Nomination and Classification Association) website.

#### Closing Date
The closing date for tender submission is August 22, 2023 at 14:00. 

#### Expected Contract Start Date
October 1, 2023

#### Expected Contract End Date
March 31, 2024
